user.title: OVO Energy Australia Setup
user.description: Enter your OVO Energy Australia authentication tokens. Note: Tokens expire every 5 minutes and need to be refreshed. See documentation for token extraction instructions.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to OVO Energy API
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication tokens. Please check your access_token, id_token, and account_id.

abort.already_configured: This OVO Energy account is already configured
